discourse_list.title: EIP2535 Likely to Reach Final Status Soon

content.content: EIP2535 Diamonds is likely to become final on 3 October 2022. Wording suggestions on how things are explained and any other recommendations about how it is written that could improve it before it becomes final is appreciated.
content.GPT-summary: The author of EIP2535 Diamonds is requesting feedback on the proposal before it becomes final on October 3, 2022. The author is open to suggestions on how to improve the wording and overall content of the proposal. Additionally, constructive criticism and reviews from third parties are welcome.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: EIP-2535 Diamonds became “Final” today: EIP-2535: Diamonds, Multi-Facet Proxy
